name: That bastard Plum
description:
I made this in a single day using construct 3. I really wanted to make a game that's open source and easily moddable so I tried it out! To mod the game, download the C3P file and load it into construct 3. Then you can modify it all ya want!

In this game you play as Plum who explores whatever place modders put this dude in. This game cannonically takes place in the Blemie's world tour universe, hense the character design. The main gimmick of this game are the the "purple mouse blocks" which can drag about with Plum's strength. 

If you make a mod of this game and upload it, please make sure to credit me and @ me on Twitter that you made a mod.
